assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Manappuram Finance Limited, a non-banking financial company, provides retail credit products and financial services in India. The company offers loans against the pledge of household and used gold jewelry, as well as short-term personal and business gold loans; microfinance loans and other financial services to low income population; loans for construction, extension, purchase, and improvement of homes; loans for hospitality industry; tour and travel loan; and vehicle loans. It also provides life and nonlife insurance products; IT solutions; and depository, pan card, and foreign exchange and money transfer services. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 3,531 branches in 23 states and 5 union territories. The company was formerly known as Manappuram General Finance and Leasing Limited and changed its name to Manappuram Finance Limited in 2011. Manappuram Finance Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Thrissur, India.
